Member Function Documentation

virtual float sxsdk::rendering_light_class::evaluate_distribution ( const sxsdk::vec3 &  p,
void *  aux = 0 
) const [virtual]

Gets the distribution light intensity of the specified coordinates.

Since distribution lights do not shine in just one direction, the intensity depends on the position receiving the light.

Parameters:
p the coordinates for evaluating the intensity
virtual sxsdk::stream_interface* sxsdk::rendering_light_class::get_attribute_stream_interface_with_uuid ( const sx::uuid_class &  id,
